mainEntity.name: What makes Shopify Plus different from Basic Shopify plans?

acceptedAnswer.text: Shopify Plus offers advanced features specifically designed for high-growth businesses and enterprises, including the ability to manage multiple stores, extensive checkout customization, and unlimited staff accounts. It also provides advanced API access, enabling integration with custom apps, third-party systems like Salesforce Commerce Cloud, and enhanced wholesale capabilities. Unlike basic Shopify plans, Shopify Plus supports up to 10,000 checkouts per minute and is ideal for businesses generating over $1 million in annual revenue.

mainEntity.name: How does Shopify Plus support international eCommerce businesses?

acceptedAnswer.text: Shopify Plus simplifies global expansion with its multi-store management feature, allowing businesses to operate up to 10 online stores under a single Shopify account. It supports over 133 currencies and offers free automated translations, enabling localized experiences. Shopify Plus also integrates local payment methods and provides tools to manage international pricing strategies, ensuring consistency across markets.

mainEntity.name: How can Shopify Plus improve conversion rates for eCommerce businesses?

acceptedAnswer.text: Shopify Plus enhances conversion rates through advanced checkout customization and the use of Shopify Scripts for dynamic pricing and personalized offers. Merchants can create tailored customer experiences during the checkout process by offering custom discounts and personalized product pricing. Businesses utilizing these features have reported up to a 30% increase in conversion rates due to the improved checkout experience and customer journey optimization.
